dt: {bc}the hair that grows on a man's face often excluding the mustache
{bc}a hairy or bristly appendage or tuft

et: Middle English {it}berd{/it}, from Old English {it}beard{/it}; akin to Old High German {it}bart{/it} beard, Latin {it}barba{/it}
shortdef: the hair that grows on a man's face often excluding the mustache
a hairy or bristly appendage or tuft
